title: Lida93
author: Lida93
content: Sitting outside enjoying the early morning sunshine I was just contemplating on certain national issues as it affect the nation entirely, and then a divergence to the Nigerian economy and the unfriendly nature of the Nigerian financial policies to cryptocurrency activities.Going by this I recounted that few days  from now as we sail into the year 2023 the nation looks forward to her general elections to elect new leaders into governmental positions who will then makes decisions on our behalf as it affects we the citizens in every spheres. Listening to the manifestos of each of the politicians, from those contesting for the position of the President, Senate/Rep members, down to governor's, there was no single politician's manifesto that discussed about intentions of putting up policies that would make for an enabling environment for  digital currency like cryptocurrencies to operate without inimical restrictions or ban.It should suffice us to know that it is through a time as this that youths involved in cryptocurrency operations can have the possibility of  opportunity to enjoy an economic/political environment that is crypto-friendly in correspondence to support and electing of politicians that have a large interest for cryptocurrency utilization, in addition to other national developmental issues bothering the nation. For the Feb, 2023 general elections are just by the corner which might seem too short in time that we can't achieve much in this project, but within the four years intervals that would come by for in preparation to another general elections it would be pertinent and of immense necessity that youths push to the frontline for support for politicians with crypto-friendly programmes, initiatives and policies in their manifesto. This I believe to be one strategy amongst many others that we can use to achieving a crypto business friendly government as we have so desired.Your inputs to this idea be it critique or support would appreciated!

comments.body: Quote from: Lida93 on December 26, 2022, 12:10:08 PM it would be pertinent and of immense necessity that youths push to the frontline for support for politicians with crypto-friendly programmes, initiatives and policies in their manifesto.
